entries.Setting the region:
You can set the region for a server with `{invoker}lol setregion <region>`.

The valid region codes are NA (default), BR, EUNE, EUW, JP, KR, LAN, LAS, OCE, RU, and TR. Alternatively, you can also temporarily define a region for a summoner by appending `:<region>` to the end of a summoner name.

Some examples:
`{invoker}lol summoner hide on bush:kr`
`{invoker}lol `
